title: Lincoln's WARNING #100029: Crypto Regulation Debate Heats Up #Shorts
script: Check this out: Crypto Regulation Debate Heats Up. They do this EVERY time! Create a crisis, offer the 'solution,' and somehow billionaires end up RICHER! It's a MAGIC TRICK! 'Pick a card, any card - OH LOOK, WE RICH AGAIN!' Stop falling for it! QR below.
